system.description:
Beginning at 6th level, when you choose your bonded artifact’s form, you gain an additional benefit based on the form chosen.

  • If your artifact is manifested as an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.l97xnqcpxnc12jpo]{Armor of Power}, it gains the Spiked and Camouflaged properties.
  • If your artifact is manifested as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uga2gmf3559332tw]{Weapon of Power}, it gains the Flamboyant and Vicious properties.
  • If your artifact is manifested as a @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.00ein6jo2oc0asex]{Font of Power}, select 3 cantrips from the Druid list. You have access to them while the artifact is in this form. You can choose different cantrips each time you set the artifact to font form.
